hopobject.name: Ethernet expansion board
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.1.2) Gecko/20090729 Firefox/3.5.2 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
hopobject.body:
The Zippy is a expansion board for the BeagleBoard that provides the following interfaces:

* 10BaseT Ethernet
* additional SD/MMC interface
* battery backed-up Real Time Clock (RTC)
* additional RS-232 serial port
* 5V I2C expansion interface.

The Zippy board attaches to the BeagleBoard via the expansion connector. The board connects to the back of the BeagleBoard and is the same physical size: 3.1" in. x 3.0 in.

Contact = rusty@tincantools.com
hopobject.shortdesc: Expansion board that provides: Ethernet, SD/MMC, battery backed-up RTC, RS-232 serial port, and a 5V I2C interface for the BeagleBoard.
